  dm - a utility for managing docker machines and compositions

  Usage: dm [options] <command>

  Examples:
    # assign deploybot to node-b
    dm assign deploybot.badevops.com node-b

    # check all current assignments
    dm status

    # check assignment for deploybot
    dm status deploybot.badevops.com

    # check logs for deploybot (on its assigned machine)
    dm compose deploybot.badevops.com logs # OR
    dmc deploybot.badevops.com logs

  Commands:
    status [|machine|composition] [<name>]  show status of machine or composition
                                            (no arguments shows total status report)

    list [machines|compositions]            list available [machines|compositions]

    assign <composition> <machine>          assigns <composition> to <machine>
                                            (no arguments will allow interactive prompt)

    unassign <composition>                  unassigns <composition> from current assigned machine
                                            (no arguments will allow interactive prompt)

    configure <machine>                     shows export variables for configuring shell to <machine>
                                            (no arguments will allow interactive prompt)

    compose <composition> [<args>]          forwards <args> to docker-compose for <composition> argument
                                            (executes against assigned machine)

  Options:
    --no-prompt | -y                        skip prompt for overriding existing assignment

    --quiet | -q                            dont complain when unassigning empty assignments

    --no-pull | -p                          dont git pull when executing command

    --git | -g                              auto commit assign/unassign symlink changes
